div.p:
In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe be the balliez of the samyn
the xj dai of Januar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxij /

In the action movit betuix Johne of
chamer and Sandris prat fleschar' anent iiijor li' iij s' clamyt be the said John' fra the
said alexander / The said alexander producit thir persons vndirwritin as the day assignit til him
topreve the payment of the said some / quhilkis persons the gret aith sworn and parti
culary examinit deponit as eftir folowis . that is tosay Alexander fyndlaw first witnes
deponis be his aith / that he herd Johne of chamer ask fra Sandris prat x s'
sayand that he was pait of the lave / Johne of narne second witnes declaris
that he herd John' of chamer say / that Sandris prat had payt him to x s' gif the blak
money was vncryit downe that day that he made this rehers' / quhilk
was thorisday before the criing downe of the blak money Rob mathosoune
thrid witnes declaris that he herd Johne of chamer say that he was pait al to
x s' the money being vncryit downe than Thom of narn ferd and last wit
nes deponis / that gif the said money was vncryit downe in the tym / that the said
Johne of chamer was pait al til x s' quhilkis witnez war sworn in presence of John chameris procuratouris

The samen dai Johne the vaus ane of the ballies chargit alexander prat til content and pay
til Johne of chamer or his procuratoris x s' of the rest of the said some' within terme of law

Item the said balye assignit monunday cum xv dais til Androw branch toanswer' to the
borch strekit be androw Wenton' of the wrangwis' halding of iiij s' iij d'

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiijo die Januarij
anno Domini supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

The samen day comperit in Jugement before the aldirman balyeis consale and communite of abirdene
Alexander of chamer the sone quhilk proponit and schew to thaim that he had half a nettis
fisching of the raik in assedacion of the toune for certane termes contenit in the said
assedacion vndir the common Seil of the said burgh In the quhilk he was inquiet
and trublit / askand and requirand the saidis aldirman and balyeis togif him a knaulege
of ane assise of the best and worthiast of the said burgh quhethir he has rycht
to the said half nettis fisching or nocht / The quhilk actione was put til ane
assise of thir persons vndirwritin that is tosay Alexander menyes Johne colison Johne
of culan alexander rede Dauid symson Alexander howisone alexander marr' gilbert the
vaus Johne the vaus androw branch Dauid mathoson William blindsel thomas
prat William the hay William of Kintor Wilyam moyses John' steuart Edmond
the hay thom of marr' Johne Wormot Johne of glenmalvin Wat of achneve
and William of gariach / quhilkis persons the grete aith sworn and riply avisyt
fand and deliuerit be gilbert the vaus forspekar of the assise / that the said Alexander
of chavmer has verray ful richt til ane half nettis fisching of the Raik for
al the termes contenit in the generale assedacion vndir the common seil of the said burgh
eftir the tenour of the samyn

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes de camera capellanus ac procurator Alexandri Irvin
de Drum protestabatur nomine procuratorio quo supra pro vno annuo Redditu duarum marcarum eidem domi
no de Drum annuatim et hereditarie debit' de vna terra vasta Jacente apud li scule hil inter terram
Sancti Johannis Jerosolomitam ex parte orientali et terram quondam domini Johannis de Kynloch nunc Sancti ninianj ex
parte occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit
in curia coram ballivis pro secundo die huius processus Testibus Ricardo bernys Johanne carl et phi
lippo de Dunbrek vno sergeandorum dicti burgi

Marioria giffard secundo die vocata ad sectam Willelmi hay non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch
seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

Jacobus de Kintor tercio die vocatus ad intrare faciendum Willelmum troup pro quo deuenit plegius ad sectam
Donaldi sclatar non comparuit / Ideo precipitur Duncano straloch seriando capere districtum de dicto Jacobo et premunire
eum ad comparere faciendum dictum Willelmum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam et peremptorem diem processus

the samyn dai the Aldirman Robert blindsel producit ane chartir of our Souerane lord the kingis
vndir the gret Seil of fre gift donacion and concessione of the custum of Salmond of the
wattiris of Dee and Done as in the said chartir mare fullely is contenit and gert the said
chartir opinly be red in presence of the hail court balyeis consale and communite / the quhilk beand
red the hail counsale and communite grauntit / that the propine with the costis and expens' made be the
said aldirman and his complicis for the owyrgetting of the said custum of salmond and for the said char
tir and lettres made tharupon salbe payt to the said aldirman and sal fre him of al propyne
costis and expensis made tharupon' the quhilk graunt was made opinly Johne the vaus
the balye passand with a wand throu the tolbuthe inquirand and sperand at al and sindry
personis beand thare present seueraly ilkane be thaim self and grantand to the payment of
the said propyne costis and expensis made tharupon as said is except v or vj persons

Eodem die Alexander marr procurator et nomine procuratorio Johannis marr' patris suj accedens ad
barram protestatus fuit pro annuo redditu decim solidorum eidem Johanni de marr' annua
tim et hereditare debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente ex parte occidentali vici fur
carum inter terram thome ramyson ex parte australi et terram Edwardi top ex
boriali parte / Ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus alexandro rol
land andrea smyth et Duncano straloch seriando burgj

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xvij die Januarij anno et cetera lxxxij Symon mason calumpniavit
per plegium alexandrum fynny de iniusta detenctione xvij solidorum et iij d' de resta maioris summe / et dictus alexander
peciit diem legalem ad respondendum qui sibi conceditur ad diem lune ad octo dies

Iniungitur Alexandro marr' ad respondendum die lune ad octo dies super plegio porrecto per Willelmum garuiach de
iniusta detencione ij li' g' et v s' g' ad bonum compotum

The samen dai Robert club clamyt Wil of fivy of the wrangwis' halding of a stik of
brade claith fra him as he that perofferit til him tharfor j merk of vsual money in that
tym that it was pawndit for / and the said William askit lachful day toansuer' and thar
was assignit til him mononday next tocum

Item the said day maistir Androw leil thezaurar' of Abirdene comperit before the aldirman and
balyeis in Jugement and sperit gif ony procuratouris war' of maistir John' of chameris
that wald ressaue 15 ducatis or the avail tharof haffand power' toressaue and
gif quittance of the said some' allegiand that he was redy todeliuer the samen some'
eftir the tenor of our haly fadir the papis lettrez be him and vthir personis / and for the tym the said
maistir Johne nor na procuratour in his name comperit / And syne incontinent he passit
to the merket cors with a balye / and gert proclame opinly gif ony procuratouris of
the said maistir Johnis war present that had power' as said is / that thai suld cum til
him Johne colisone or John' of culan in his name this day or to morn be evin
and thai suld make him ful contentacion and payment of the said some.

the samyn dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that Alexander of marr' sal pay
til Wilyam of garuiach xl s' scottis for the li' g' in sa fer as the said alexander is aw
and til the said William pund gret / pund gret like eftir the tenour of the said
Williamis borgh . struckin apon the said alexander / and tobe pait within terme of law and
bath the saidis partiis was oblist thar' handis wphaldin til stand to this deliuerence

Item the said dai Richart ancram maistir masone of the kirk wark grantit him fullely
content and pait be the handis of William of Kintor of four' pundis assignit to the said Richart
be the toune acht be vmquhile Johne of Kintor and the said William his sone' for thare
gressum of demj net of Done / Of the quhilkis four' pundis the said Richard quytclemit and
dischargit the said William and his fadir thare ayris executouris and assignais for evyr'
Curia ballivorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo die Januarij anno Domini et cetera lxxxijdo

quo die
comparuit coram preposito et ballivis in Judicio Willelmus spens' filius et heres quondam Ade spens alias
litstar burgensis huius burgi non vi aut metu choactus ut asseruit et Juravit sed suo proprio motu
nemine cogen' fecit constituit et elegit auunculum suum patricium Duncanson suum verum legittimum
curatum irreuocabilem ad regendum et gubernandum suam personam terras redditus et possessiones ac
cetera bona sua mobilia et immobilia sibi de Jure quomodolibet incumbencia pro sex annis proximis futuris
dicto Willelmo iam existen' ut asseretur etatis xvj annorum uel eocirca Ita tamen quod dictus patricius curatus
antedictus prouideat diligenter pro terris et bonis ipsius Willelmi et ad commodum et proficuum eiusdem Willelmi
duran' tempore prenotato vj annorum

Jacobus panton' constituit alexandrum chamer filium et andream branche suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim ad
prosequendum legittime et recuperandum certa bona hereditaria filio et heredi quondam Johannis baxtar et sororis dicti
Jacobi pertinencia in latissima forma procuratorie Et promisit de Rato et cetera

The samen dai it was ordanit and deliuerit be ane assise gilbert the vaus forspekar anent xvj s' g'
clamit be magnus Wormot fra William blindsel / that quhat Alexander sanchar' wil depone be his
aith at his cuming that William blindsel is awand til magnus Wormot / that the said Wilyam
sal pay and content him tharof within terme of law

Andreas murray senior vocatus ad prosequendum actionem suam aduersus Ranaldum talyour non comparuit vnde porrexit plegium
idem Ranaldus quod quitus fuit a calumpnia sua donec nouiter fuerit attachiamentus

Eodem die productio testium citatorum pro parte Willelmi malissone' et determinacio plegij porrecti per
Johannem malissone et Recontrariacionis eiusdem per Willelmum malisson' penes dictos testes differtur
ad crastinum diem cum consensu parcium propter debilitatem curie et precipitur partibus ad tunc ostendendum raciones
suas in scriptis pro meliori informacione

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxjo die Januarij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij / Actio supradicta inter
Willelmum malisson et Johannem malissone adhuc continuatur de consensu parcium propter debilitatem istius
curie in eodem statu quo nunc ut post supra in actione proxime curie vsque diem lune prime integre ebdomide
quadragesime sub spe concordie absque preiudicio alicuius partis

The same day comperit before John' the vaus ane of the ballies in Jugement alexander alanson burges
of abirdene and grantit him awand til Duncan of Dunbrek twa merkis of vsual monee tobe payit
at Witsonday and michelmes next tocum be evinly porcionis / And anent xj s' iiij d' debatabil
betuix the saidis alexander and Duncan / gif the said alexander previs nocht his payment within the saidis termis
he sal mak payment of that some' like as he dois of the ij merkis be the said termez And
for securite of payment the said alexander alansone has resignit his land liand in the nethir
kirkgate in the said balyeis hand be a glufe tobe sald and demainnyt as law wil
for the payment of the said twa merkis togiddir with the xj s' iiij d' gif it failyeis of his preif
of payment / and of his payment making at the termes before nemmyt before thir witnes
Dauid Kintor thom vaus John' malissone philp of Dunbrek seriand and vthir diuers'

Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per Johannem Waus vnum ballivorum eiusdem xxiiij die
Januarij anno predicto

The quhilk day the assise has continuit the borch struckin be Johne malissone on Ra
nald talyour for the wrangwis' halding of xxxv s' iiij d' to Wednisday or within / that
ser Nicol prowdy may cum and declare the verite sa fer as he knawis betuix
the partiez / and the said partiez ar content tostand to the deliuerence of the said ser nicol
in the said caus'

cristiana fichet et Agnes smyth vocate ad sectam gilberti leche prout premuniente fuerunt per seriandum
non comparuerunt Ideo precipitur seriendum quod captis districtis ab eisdem ipsas summoneat ad xxvij diem Januarij

Iniungitur Ranaldo talyour ad respondendum die lune ad quindenam super plegio porrecto per Andream
murray seniorem pro iniusta detencione xix li' et x solidorum a dicto andrea ad bonum compotum / quod plegius inuenit
super eundem Ranaldum tanquam debitorem pro tribus carnificibus

The samyn xxiiij day of Januar' yer' et cetera lxxxij / comperit in the tolbuthe of Abirdene before the
aldirman and ane of the ballies of that samen maistir Androw leil thesaurar' of abirdene on the ta part
and ser Androw of chawmer bruthir german to maistir Johne of chawmer on the tuthir part / procuratoure to
the said maistir Jhon as wes knawin to ser Johne of striueling notar' public thare vppon
than present And the thesaurar' forsaid exponit that he wes awand to the said maistir Johne
ane hundreth ducatis of gold be resoun of expens' made in the pley of the subchawntoury
of murref / Ande to vmchev censuris and paynis of the lettres of executorialis chargit honerable
men Johne of culane and John colisone of the said burgh burges to noumir tel and deliuer to the
said ser Androw as procuratour to his bruthir maistir Jhon ane hundre demyis and crownis of gold
and to fulfil and mak als' gude the said jC crownis and demyis as the ducate and askit /
acquitainis' thareof / The quhilk Johne of culan and John colisoune tellit and nowmirit
apon the commoun kyst / ilkane of thaim fifty demyis and crounis of gold in presence of the
communite and tomak thaim to that resoun of the ducate quhare thai falit And than baith
the partys consentit at the said jC demys and crownis suld remain in the handis of the
said Johne and Jhon for xv dayis / quhil the said ser Androw mycht send to his bruthir'
and haf his mynd or tomak concord in the said matir / And the thesaurar' forsaid promiste
at the said monee suld rest in the handis of persouns forsaid ay and quhil he delyuerit
acquitainis' to him for the said some / to the vtilite and profyt of the said maistir Johne / and
toger thaim ansuer' tharevppon and he / tobe dischargit tharof for evir' saffing con
corde tobe made be the partyis gif it plesit thame / for the thesaurar' forsaid expo
nit he mycht nocht travale withoute danger' of his persoun of infirmite and vthirwayis
the land wes sum parte / misrewlit and diuers' men spulyeit and vthir diuers' slane and mur
dryist / bot he suld mak the said Johne of culan and Jhon colisone be responsale to the
said maistir Jhone ay and quhil it plesit him to resaif it and gif quitans' tharefore
bot he protestit that na paynis suld ryn vppon him sen he had delyuerit the said
soume and in tyme and put it in merchandis handis and content thaim tharefor to the vtilite and
profyte of the said maistir Johne / witnes heirof Robert blindsel aldirman Johne the vaus
balye alexander rede John Wormot William blindsel Dauid marr' Johne malissone androw
murray eldar gilbert morisone and Ranald talyour burgez of abirdene with vthiris sindry

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxvij die mensis
Januarij anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die curia affirmata marioria giffard tercio die vocata ad
sectam Willelmi hay pro iniusta detencione vnius singuli argentati / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur seriando
capere districtum de dicta marioria et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et
peremptorem diem huius processus

Eodem die Dauid symsone primo die vocatus ad sectam Thome prat pro iniusta detencione
xlvij solidorum et vj d' / non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capto districto ad eodem ipsum premuni
at ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius placiti

Cristiana fichet primo die vocata ad sectam gilberti leche pro iniusta receptione bonorum suorum
non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando quod capto districto ad eadem ipsam summoneat ad
proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Eodem die decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro Judicio per os thome talyour Judicatoris curie quod
Donaldus sclatar deuenit ad causam et clameum suum contra et aduersus Willelmum troup et
Jacobum de Kintor eius plegium de iniusta detencione xij solidorum argenti et vnius nefrendi
li galt nuncupati etatis vnius annj causa non defensa Et quod satisfacere tenetur dicto Do
naldo infra terminum Juris / et sunt in quatuor amerciamentis pro absencia dicti Willelmi ab ista curia
et tribus curiis legalibus precedentibus

Item eodem die iniungitur Alano smyth per prepositum et ballivos ad intrandum Joneta alias famulam nicholai
baxtar pro qua deuenit plegius hodie ad quindenam responsurus et Juri periturus ad sectam dicti nicholai

Eodem die Johannes malisson primo die vocatus responsurus plegio super eundem inuento per Edwardum
malisoune pro iniusta detencione xxvj solidorum non comparuit Ideo precipitur alexandro chamour seriando
capere districtum de dicto Johanne et cetera et premunire eundem ad comparendum die veneris vltimo
die mensis instantis tanquam ante termino peremptorio sibi assignato

the assise has ordanit alexander of chamer seriand tocontent and pay til ser Androw thomson' j merk
of siluer betuix this and Witsonday esely as he may pay It be certane porcionis

The samyn day Androw ancroft is oblist to the aldirman and ballies that he sal compere this
day viij daies the ta part / and Ibbe his gude modir on the tuthir part / And than
til vndirly ane assise of vnsuspect persounis anent al debatis count and rekning that
ony of the said partis has tosay til vthir'

Assisa Alexander menyes Dauid symsone Dauid menyes gilbertus vaus thomas prat
Thomas de marr' Dauid marr' Jacobus de Kintor Adam de crafurd Willelmus moy
ses alexander scrogis Jacobus craik alexander trail the quhilk assise has continuit the
action and caus' movit betuix John' of Knollis and henry rede of Kyncorth with
consent of bath the partiez to friday next tocum but preiudice of ony party / and that day
tocomper' tovndirly the determinacione of the said assise / the quhilk friday alexander rede John' vaus
Wil blindsel Wil of Kintor and Wil necolson war sworn til the assise in absence of part of thaim et cetera

the ballies has assignit in the court til James craik this day xv dais toanswer' to the
borch strekin on him be patrik stiklaw for the wrangwis' halding of demj stik of lawne / j doubil
bonet and of certane fracht of iiijor sellatis / iij par' of gluffis of plait / j li' saiffron' ij li'
peppir j li' of ginger j dusan of blak lambskynis iij rede cappis and ij blak ij li' of rede
wax and of certane vthir gudis et cetera

Item the same day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise Dauid menyes yongar'
forspekar' of the sammyn / that gilbert morisone is ful dettour' til Androw the
Waus of sex pundis of vsuale money for ocht that thai haf herd or sene
in the contrar' / tobe pait to the said androw within terme of law

The samyn day in the action movit be on the behalue of William the hay and his forspekar againis mariory
giffard of the wrangwis' halding of a siluer belt / becaus' androw branch on the behalf
of the said Wilyam allegit tomak gude that scho was pait for that belt before
the downe criing of the blak money / the assise fyndis that quhat tym that be made
gude as forsaid is / that the said mariory suld deliuer the samen siluer belt til Wilyam
hay / And to the production of the witnessing tharof the ballies has assignit this day
xv daies and that day tobring sufficient preif in the said matir as the assise has ordanit

gillegawdy conuict be the assise was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis halding of
xvj d' or a lax worth xvj d' fra Dauy Duncan
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eisdem vltimo die Januarij anno et cetera lxxxijdo

The quhilk day it was decretit and deliuerit be ane sworn assise chosin with consent of
partys within writin / that the borgh folowit be Johne of Knollis on henry rede of Kyncorth
for the wrangwis' halding fra him of thre barellis of salmond and v s' of siluer is of
vail / quharfor the said henry was adiugit in amerciament of the court and tocontent and
pay the said John' within terme of law

In curia tenta per balliuos in pretorio de abirdene quarto die februarij anno Dominj supradicto Johannes lammyn
ton conuictus per assisam amerciatur quia iniuste perturbavit andream lowsone Et dictus andreas in amerciamento pro pertur
bio eiusdem Johannis verbo / et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum

Item andreas lammynton lowsone in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione trium solidorum et ix denariorum a Johanne lammynton'
prout compertum fuit per assisam

Willelmus mornys et quidem gilbertus amerciatur pro perturbio adinuicem / et iniungitur vtraque pro emenda ad deliberandum
dimidij libre cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis et cetera

div.head: Copia
div.p:
Omnibus hanc cartam visuris uel audituris Johannes scherar' carnifex burgensis burgi de Abirdene eternam in
domino salutem Noueritis me dedisse concessisse et ad feodofirmam dimisisse et hac presenti carta mea con
firmasse Johanni blithnes incole dicti burgi et mariorie sponse sue vnam particulam terre mee Jacentis ad finem vici
castri extra portam eiusdem inter terram thome verty ex occidentali parte ab vna et communem viam regiam qua itur
ad montem castri versus austrum et alias duas vias regias uersus boriam et oriens Tenendum et habendum
dictam particulam terre cum pertinenciis prefatis Johanni blithnes et mariorie sponse sue et eorum alter diucius viuentibus
et heredibus suis et suis assignatis de me et heredibus meis et meis assignatis in feodo et hereditate
ac in libero burgagio imperpetuum in debitis longitudine et latitudine cum fronte et cauda cum edificiis et
orto desuper constructis et construendis et cum omnibus aliis libertatibus comoditatibus et aisiamentis ac instrumentis suis
pertinenciis quibuscumque ad dictam particulam terre cum pertinenciis spectan' sue iuste spectare valen' quomodolibet
in futurum libere quiete plenarie integre bene et in pace sine reuocacione aliquali Reddendo inde
michi et heredibus meis aut meis assignatis dicti Johannes blythnes et marioria sponsa sua et
eorum alter diucius viuens et heredes sui et sui assignati annuatim vnum annuum redditum sex solido
rum et octo denariorum vsualis monete Scocie ad duos annj terminos vsuales penthicostes videlicet
et Sancti martini in yeme per equales porciones nomine feode firme tantum pro omni alio seruicio seculari
exactione seu demanda que de predicta particula terre cum pertinenciis aliqualiter exigi poterit aut re
quiri Et ego vero dictus Johannes scherar' heredes mei et assignati dictam particulam
terre cum pertinenciis prefatis Johanni blythnes et mariorie sponse sue et eorum diucius viuentibus et
heredibus suis et assignatis per omnes terras nostras ac per omnia bona nostra mobilia et immobilia in omnibus et
per omnia ut premissum est pro firma prenotata contra omnes mortales varantizabimus acquitabimus et imperpetuum defendemus
In cuius rei testimonium quia sigillum proprium non habui Sigillum prouidi viri Alexandri scrogis burgensis dicti bur
gi huic presenti carte cum instancia apponj procurauj vna cum sigillo honorabilis viri Johannis de
Kintor vnius balliuorum ac datorum saisine dicte terre apud dictum burgum decimo die mensis Junij anno
Domini Mmo iiijcmo septuagesimoquarto / testibus Dauid de Kintor Johanne crommy Johanne narn Jacobo
craik Willelmo adamson Willelmo merynnis et Duncano straloch seriando cum multis aliis / Quam quidam
cartam predictis Sigillis sigillat' publice in curia perlectam / dictus Johannes blythnes peciit copiari coram
hiis testibus Alexandro de camera vno balliuorum Dauid kintor alexandro hay Willelmo blindsel Simone
de gardin domino Johanne striuelin notario et moricio besat seriando cum diuersis aliis

The vij day of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxij / the aldirman and consale has statute and ordanit the bax
taris to make the twa penny laif contenand xxiiij vncis of weil bakyn brede and the
penny laif of xij vncis thareftir / And that fra thine furth thai baik na four' penny lafis
bot twa penny laiffis and penny lafis and of na gretar price / and that thai by the quhete
on sic price that thai may keip the samyn paas' vndir the pain of ane vnlaw and
eschete of the brede

The samen dai Edmond the hay callit tocomper' as the day assignit til him til preve
his deliuerence of mare gudis in mawnis Wormotis schip than was ressauit
furth of the samyn / comperit nocht / And than incontinent the said mawnis deponit and
declarit be his aith togiddir with thom matland and Androw mernach producit be him
his marinaris in the tym / that thai deliuerit alsmekil gudis of Edmond the hayis
as merchand til his brudir alexander hay as thai ressauit within buyrd be thar' witting
and knew na mare gudis of tharis than thai had deliuerit / quharfor the said
edmond was adiugit til content and pay til mawnys Wormot his hail fracht
clamyt be him / sen he falyeit in his preif as forsaid is.

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem decimo die februarij
Anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die precipitur murthaco glenmalvin per ballivos ad satisfaciendum seu satis
fieri faciendum Johanni de Kintor de firma terre sue assedate Edmundo hay et sponse sue pro
quibus fideiussit veluti fatebatur in curia et hoc infra terminum Juris
Cristiana fichet secundo die vocata ad sectam gilberti leche non comparuit quare precipitur seriando et cetera

Eodem die Ranaldus talyour primo die vocatus ad sectam Andree murray senioris pro iniusta deten
cione xix librarum et x solidorum a dicto andrea ad bonum compotum tanquam debitor pro tribus carnificibus non comparuit
Ideo precipitur seriando quod capto districto ab eodem Ranaldo ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem

Item eodem die ballivi assignauerunt henrico owrum hodie ad octo dies ad producendum et ostendendum legit
timam diffesianciam cuiusdam obligacionis sue facte honorabili militi Willelmo Knollis preceptori
de torfichin de quinque librarum g' / vel ad satisfaciendum eidem militi aut suis procuratoribus seu
factoribus de dicta summa infra terminum Juris

Johannes Waus vnus ballivorum huius burgi fatebatur in curia quod ipse tanquam factor dicti militis
recepit quatuor libras grossorum ab henrico owrum de prefata obligacione / et quod releua
bit eundem de illa summa recepta

Iniungitur andree branche ad respondendum proxima curia legali super plegio porrecto per Andream Wenton'
pro iniusta detencione iiijor solidorum

precipitur Edmundo hay ex deliberacione assise ad satisfaciendum magno Wormot de integro naulo suo
pro bonis receptis de naue sua infra tres refluxiones maris Et idem magnus quitus per assisam de barel
la salie li ber' per dictum edmundum clamat' pro adhuc ostensis ingnarium

Item assisa ordinavit quod magnus Wormot acquitabit se cum nautis suis crastina die de barella salis
petita per alexandrum hay

Actio inter Willelmum hay et marioriam giffard differtur ad quindenam cum consensu parcium comparencium ex parte dictorum
Willelmi et mariorie

The xj dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxij mawnis Wormot producit before the balye thomas fife thom
matland and androw murnach witnes todepone with him anent the barrel of salt clamit be alexander hay / the
quhilkis mawnis thom and androw sworn in presence of the said alexander concordialy deponit / that thai deliuerit
alsmekil salt as was ressauit be thare witting of the said alexandris in mawnis Wormotis schip

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies the xvij dai of februar' yer' forsaid It was decre
tit and ordanit be ane assise that gif adam of crafurd wil swere that he herd adam Walkar' ordand
togif til marion bol his modir viij s' that ibbe Walkar' was awand til the said adam Walkar'
quhom god assoilye / that alan smyth sal pay thai viij s' til the said marion' bol / and gif he wil
nocht swere that / allan salbe quyte of the said marionis clame of the said some' / And the said
marion' has constitute alexander trail hir' procuratour in that matir

Item the assise fand and deliuerit that Androw ramsay sal deliuer til alexander alanson his weddis that he held
for certane malt siluer becaus' it was fundin sufficient payment that was made til Robert
blindsel aldirman on the behalf of the said androw be alexander alansonis wif

The xviij dai of februar' forsaid patrik fichet clamit Sande prat of a swerd quhilk he
said was wrangwisly analijt fra him / and the said Sande allegit a warrand for him that
he bocht the said swerd fra in the kingis merket And than the ballies assignit til him this
day xv dais tobring his warrand and has fundin thom of narne souerty that it salbe furth
cumand to the law

Eodem die presentes in consilio Johannes colisone Johannes culan Thomas de fife balliuus Dauid symson'
Johannes Wormot gilbertus vaus alexander marr' Dauid mathoson Johannes vaus ballivus Johannes vaus filius gilbertj
alexander howison Willelmus blindsel Dauid menyes senior thomas de marr' Dauid marr' Johannes glenmaluin alexander
trail Robertus prat Ricardus hil Ranaldus talyour Dauid hil henricus owrum Johannes de torryleith Willelmus de tulidef
Donaldus strathachin andreas Wenton andreas murra senior andreas murref iunior Simon de crafurd henricus
Mortymer Willelmus quelp Willelmus Dunbrek Willelmus portar thomas iameson et Jacobus andirson burgenses de
abirdene / Quj omnes vnanimj consensu et assensu consencierunt ac quilibet eorum per se consenciit
interrogat' per alexandrum de camera vnum seriandorum et decreuerunt ac quilibet eorum decreuit quod Robertus
blindsel prepositus huius burgi erit releuatus et indempnis conseruatus de Sexaginta libris seu de
Salmonibus extenden' ad predictam summam lx librarum pro quibus per suas litteras obligatorias obli
gatur pro suis expensis factis certa et penes vnam cartam regiam per dominum nostrum Regem gratiose
concessam super redempcione et adnullacione custume salmonum dicti burgi de abirdene ad perpetuam rei
memoriam durature / et cetera Testibus alexandro de camera philippo de Dunbrek moricio besat
tribus seriandorum burgi dominis Roberto leis et Johanne striuelin capellanis et notariis publicis

The xxj dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxij the aldirman consel and communite of the burgh of abirdene avisitly
has grauntit and promittit to ser Walter young chaplan the erast chapilnary or seruice being
at the presentacioune or disposicione of the communite of the said burgh . that happinnys tovaik
except the chapilnary of our' lady altar' / the quhilk quhen it hapnis tovaik / the
said ser Waltir salbe content / that maistre Alexander fife chaplan of Sanct michalis altar'
be promovit to the said our' lady altar' / he being promovyt til his said chapilnary
of Sanct michel within the paris'kirk of abirdene ffor the quhilk the said ser Walter
salmak continuale divine service in the pariskirk and qvere of this burgh and gude obseruance
in matinys hie mess' and evynsang / and absent him nocht fra the said houris and divine seruice
bot gif he haf sufficient excusacion quhilk be sene resonabil to the aldirman and consel
and to the correctour of the qvere / And kepis gif he beis absent and obseruis nocht diuine
seruice as said is / he sal tyne his chaplanry or seruice / and the aldirman sal dispone
tharewpon' be avise and ordinance of the comoune' counsale et cetera

The xxiiij dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxij / the ballies chargit gilbert morison' toremayn
into the tolbuthe vnto the tyme he content and pait to Androw the vaus sex pundis of vsual money
optenit on him be the said androw eftir the tenour of the act / made tharupon / And the said gilbert
perofferit him redy topay the said some' in gold and siluer to the said androw eftir his condicion
quhilk condicion he offerit him tomak gude and protestit / that gif the said androw wald persew
him forthir' atour' his condicion that it suld turn him to na preiudice sen he was redy tovndirly
his Juge ordinar' in that matir and offerit him tharto et cetera

The same dai ser Nicol prowdy summond be the officialis lettres todeclare the verite of the
action movit betuix Johne malisson and Ranald talyour of xxxv s' iiij d' clamit be the said John'
and sworn in presence of the partiez deponit / that the said Ranald grantit topay til Johne malisson
on the sade deponaris behalf xxxv s' iiij d' / and that Ranald gert the said Johne write
in his buke the said some' pait til him nochtwithstanding thare was na payment made in the
tyme na the said ser nicol saw na money Et ego nicholaus proude factus promissa

the said dai In presence of the aldirman ballies and consale Alexander mortymar' and thom carl ar' becumin souertiis
be the fath of thar bodijs for Wil lauchlane / that this burgh the nichbouris and Inhabitantis the
samyn salbe vnscathit and vniniuryt of the said Wil lauchlan in tyme tocum vthirwais than
be way of law

The xxv dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxij In presence of the aldirman ballies and consale Alexander menyes
askit marrowschip til him of half a net of Done . quhilk he has in assedacione of the toune
protestand that gif he strekit ane hail net in faute of marrowschip that quhat costis and expens'
that he made tharapon suld be refoundit til him or ony entirit with ony vthir half net apon him

vltimo die februarij Antonius hatmakar et Johannes balcromby amerciatur pro perturbio adinuincem / Et quia idem
antonius reperiebatur prouocator dicte perturbacionis Iniungitur sibi pro emenda ad deliberandum dimidij libre cere ad lumen
Sancti sanguinis ad mandatum officiarum

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Thomam de fife vnum ballivorum eiusdem decimo
die marcij anno Dominj supradicto /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Dauid menyes gilbertus
vaus Johannes vaus Willelmus de Kintor Johannes stevinson thomas de marr' Willelmus hay Dauid Kintor
gilbertus morison andreas murray senior Dauid marr' Willelmus more henricus owrum gilbertus leche thomas
iameson Johannes vaus iunior Robertus de vchterles

Breue Inquisicionis mathei Wricht Respectuatur vsque hodie ad quindenam ex consensu
parcium et desiderio Juratorum ad assisam

Eodem die Ranaldus talyour secundo die vocatus ad sectam Andree murray senioris prout patet in rotulamento
primj diei processus / non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum et cetera

Cristiana fichet tercio die vocata ad sectam gilberti leche non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch
seriando capere districtum et cetera et premunire eandem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorum diem

Willelmus portar' super quem alexander goldsmyth nomine et ex parte Willelmi goldsmyth filij sui porrexit
plegium de iniusta detencione duarum marcarum et dimidij primo die vocatus responsurus dicto plegio / non
comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando quod capto districto ad eodem ipsum summoneat ad
proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus

xijo die marcij anno predicto coram ballivis in curia Robertus rede constituit Thomam de marr'
procuratorem suum ad prosequendum legittime actionem suam aduersus Alexandrum de marr' Et promisit de
Rato de Judicio sisti et Judicatum soluj et cetera

Magnus Wormot conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbio thome chepman et emendare eidem
vt Jura volunt / et Idem thoma quitus de perturbio dicti magnj Sed ordinatur per assisam ad satisfaciendum
dicto magno Wormot xiij s' pro naulo

The samyn day James clerk be his awne graunt was ordanit be the ballies til content and
pay til Wilyam moyn ten s' g' within terme of law tharof vj s' g' of lent siluer and iiij s' g' for
fraght

Murthacus glenmalvin in amerciamento quia iniuste perturbauit vxorem Johannis de cowis Et pro emenda assi
sa ordinavit eum ad dandum xij d' dicte vxori et dimidij libre cere ad missam Sancti sanguinis

The assise has fundin Androw ramsay dettour til content and pay James comyn of v firlotis of ber'
in like wise as he did til him of the lave of xxij bollis
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xiiij die marcij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxijo

Quo die comparuit in curia Agnes de torryleith filia et heres quondam Johannis de torryleith burgensis
huius burgi cum Thoma prat tutore testamentario eiusdem agnetis quj quidem thomas nomine quo supra
peciit cum instancia dictam Agnetem doceri et assignari vt moris est ad terras et annuos red
ditus que et quj fuerunt quondam eiusdem Johannis patris suj Et Ideo ex decreto curie iniunctum fuit Alexandro
de camera vnj ballivorum huius burgi quod vadat et congnoscat dictam Agnetem ad terras et annuos
Redditus de quibus dictus quondam pater suus obiit vltimo vestitus et cetera secundum consuetudinem burgorum

The same dai Johne colison in presence of the ballies and the mastiris of the tuthir cavil of the mydchin
gil allegit that he had cavillit the wattir of the mydchingil be him and Johne the vaus / and part
of the mastiris allegit that it was vncavillit / nochtwithstanding the said Johne perofferit to thame
tocavil the wattir new agane and thai plesit

Item Dauid menyes for him self and Wilyam blindsel denyis the cavilling of the said wattir
vnto the tyme that al personis be devodit fra that wattir that has na rycht tolabour thare

The xv dai of marche yer' forsaid / comperit In the court before the ballies Androw branche and
askit marrowschip til him of half a net of the pot in presence of thomas prat ane of the fermoris
of the samyn / and protestit that gif he strekit ane hail net in faute of marrouschip that quhat
costis and expensis that he made tharupon suld be refoundit and assithit til him or ony entirit
with ony vthir half net apon him

The same dai It was decretit and ordanit be ane sworn assise / that Symon Symonson
maistir vndir god of the schip callit Katerine of the feir' sal content and pay til Dauid menyes
apon his schippis bothum now of this last rais' hamewart wyne and salt eftir
his rekning gevin be him to the said Dauid / the said Dauid payand tharfor fracht and vncostis

The xvij dai of marche yer et cetera lxxxij / patrik badenach in the name and the behalf of Wilyam
goldsmyth his gude sone has warnit murtho glenmalvin In the tolbuthe of abirdene before
thomas of fife and Alexander chavmer twa of the bailyeis of abirdene til deliuer a hors or caus'
him tobe deliuerit to the said William the quhilk ser James ogilvy has and was vmquhile
the bischop of murrais or ellis the price of the said hors extendand til xiij merkis and a half
the quhilk hors the said William bocht fra Androw Kympty duelland in fores that the said hors
may be deliuerit til the said androw agane tokeip him scaithles eftir the tenour of his obliga
cione and band made to the said William tharupon the quhilk deliuerance of the said hors tobe
made or the price as said is in elgyne or fores within viij dais eftir that the said ser Ja
mes or murtho be warnit tharto eftir the tenour of the said obligacion subscriuit with the said mur
thois hand quhilk obligacion and band he grantit before thir witnes Johne colisoune
William the hay Johne stevinson androw branch androw rettre and philp of Dunbrek with
vthiris sindry

The same dai the assise has ordanit and deliuerit that mariory giffard sal deliuer a siluer
belt til Wilyam the hay the quhilk was plegit til hir be the said Williamz wif and to deliuer the
said belt within terme of law and that the said William has done for the redeming of the
said belt that he acht todo of law / And Stevin giffard hir sone is becumin souerty todeliuer
the said belt or than the price tharof to the said William within the said terme of law

The samyn day William necolson clamyt William malisson the sone of xxxviij s' anent John'
Wil youngis son as he that entirit for him in Jugement / the quhilk some' the said William has
tane him topreve pait this dai viij dais

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per prepositum et ballivos eiusdem xxiiijto die marcij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Dauid menyes iunior
Willelmus blindsel Johannes Waus andreas branch Willelmus hay andreas murray senior Willelmus
more Willelmus moyses magnus Wormot Johannes glenmaluin Ricardus hil henricus owrum et gilbertus
leche burgenses dicti burgi Quj jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus Andreas Wrycht capellanus
auunculus mathei Wricht latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quodam tenemento burgagio cum pertinencijs Jacente infra burgum de abirdene in
vico de le gaistraw et occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram olim thome mason' ex parte australi
et terram hered' quondam patricij smyth ex parte boriali Et quod dictus matheus est legittimus et propinquior
heres eiusdem quondam Andree auunculi suj de dicto tenemento cum pertinencijs / et legittime etatis Et
quod dictum tenementum cum pertinencijs valet nunc per annum decem solidos et tantum valuit tempore pacis / Et quod
tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale Et quod nunc existit in manibus
eiusdem domini nostri Regis legittime per seipsum causa mortis et a tempore obitus dicti quondam dominj Andree
quj obiit in mense Januarij vltimo preterito in defecti veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Ranaldus talyour tercio die vocatus ad sectam Andree murray senioris non comparuit quare precipitur philip
po Dunbrek seriando quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem
tanquam quartum et peremptorum diem huius placiti

Willelmus portar' secundo die vocatus responsurus plegio porrecto per Alexandrum goldsmyth ex parte Willelmi
goldsmyth filij suj non comparuit Ideo precipitur Duncano straloch seriando capere districtum ab eodem Willelmo
portar et premunire eum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem processus

xxvij die marcij anno et cetera lxxxiijo coram preposito et ballivis in pretorio Thomas rolland deuenit
plegius legalis pro Adam andree quod Robertus de Kintor et pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et
parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris et quod intrabit dictum adam in curia huius burgi die iuridico post
pascha Juri perituus et cetera Et eodem Robertus Kintor inuenit Willelmum more plegium legalem quod dictus adam et
pars sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua quodque comparebit responsurus dicto die ut premittitur et precipitur
sibi quod adducat terciam personam illo die existen' secum tempore perturbacionis ade andree ut asseretur

The same dai be avyse and ordinance of the consale and brethir of the gild present for the tyme
the aldirman has chargit Adam andirson and Robert Kyntor todesist and cess' fra the fisching
of ane achtand part of the crois debatable betuix thaim vnto the law day eftir pasch that it be
sene quha has maist rycht to that fisching and tobring that day sic documentis twiching thare
clame as thai wil wyn and tyne And in the meyntyme the aldirman in name of the toune
is ordanit til intromett with the said fisching quhil the rycht be decidit

Thom rolland is chargit in like wyse todesist fra the fisching apon the wattir of the
mydchingil and totak oute his net quhil the said law day and tobring with him sic document
than as he wil tyne and wyn for the decision' of his clame and rycht of that wattir

William quelp is chargit rychtsua til intromet nocht with ane demj net of Done debatabile
betuix him and alexander menyes vnto the law day eftir paisch And the said alexander is content todesist
fra the fisching of the samyn quhil the said law day without preiudice of his rycht he hafand
souerty til refound til him the profite of the said wattir pertening til him of reson' in the menetyme
eftir that the matir haf a decision' the said daw . the quhilk day the partiez . ar chargit to
produce thare rychtis and documentis as thai wil wyn and tyne / And the aldirman in name of the toune
is becumin souerty til alexander menyes as said is

The thrid dai of aprile yer' et cetera lxxxiij In the balye court / the assise deliuerit that Johne of lam
mynton' sal deliuer twa siluer spvnys til androw ramsay the quhilkis the said androw layd in wed
for xvij s' and has fundin the payment lachful that the said androw payt to the said Johne
for redeming of the said spvnys

The same dai the action movit betuix James lesly and thomas symson anent iij barrelis of salmond
is continuit be the assise in hope of concord til mononday next tocum / and that day tobe endit
les na / thai concord in the mene tyme

Dauid vaus constituit alexandrum rede et Johannem vaus fratrem eius suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim in
omnibus causis et querelis ipsum concernentibus Et promisit de rato et cetera

The ferd dai of aprile yer' forsaid It was fundin and decretit be ane assise that the chartir party
last made betuix Thomas symson maistir of a schip callit the trinite of abirdene / and his frach
tismen with thare complicis is of vail and acht tobe fulfillit in al poyntis except / that thai are made
quyte of the lying dais / And the said thomas in the court before Johne the vaus balye has
constitute Dauid menyes yongar and androw branch his procuratouris coniunctly and seueraly til persew his
frauchtismen and thare complicis for his richtis and dewiteis eftir the tenour of the said chartir party
and in al vthir actionis concerning him / todo and folou for him as law wil / promittand tohald ferm
and stabil quhatsumeuir thing his forsaidis procuratouris or ony of thaim lachfully ledis tobe done in his name

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem vijo die Aprilis anno Domini et cetera
lxxxiijo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Willelmus portar tercio die vocatus responsurus plegio porrecto per alexandrum goldsmyth nomine Willelmi
goldsmyth filius suj / non comparuit / quare precipitur Duncano straloch seriando quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum
summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorem diem huius processus

Eodem die Ranaldus talyour protestatus fuit quod deposicio Willelmi gray in actione mota inter ipsum et
andream murray seniorem non preiudicaret sibi in aliquo penes eandem

Item eodem die Alexander marr' procuratorio nomine Johannis marr' patris suj accedens ad barram protestabatur
pro vno annuo redditu x solidorum eidem Johanni marr' annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente ex
parte occidentali vici furcarum inter terram thome iameson ex parte australi et terram edwardi top ex parte
boriali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentatuit in curia
coram ballivis tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Roberto ewynson thoma gledstane burgensibus
et Duncano stralogh seriando

Thom club and his wif sworn the gret bodily aith deponit / that thai payt nevyr to ser Alexander
club chaplan of the browne croice altar nor til his predicessouris bot vij s' and viij d' yerly
of annuel oute of a land analijt be thaim to alexander skynnar' lyand in the scule hil betuix
the land of vmquhil thom trail on the eist part and the land of James crag on the west part

Item eodem die dominus Johannes de camera capellanus ac procurator dominj de Drum protestabatur nomine procuratorio quo supra pro
annuo redditu duarum marcarum eidem domino de Drum annuatim et hereditarie debit' de
terra vasta Jacente apud li sculehil inter terram Sancti Johannis ierosolomitum ex orientali parte et terram quondam domini
Johannis Kynloch nunc sancti ninianj ex parte occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die processus Testibus Roberto ewynson Johanne
carl et moricio besat seriando

Item eodem die Johannes de Kyntor filius et heres quondam gilberti de Kyntor burgensis de abirdene acce
dens ad barram protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu xiiij solidorum eidem Johanni annuatim et hereditarie debit'
et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem
vici inter terram gilberti leche ex parte boriali et terram Ricardi culan ex australi parte / Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram bal
livis tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne ferssan Roberto sleich et Duncano straloch seriando

The assise fyndis Ranald talyour na dettour til androw murray eldar of xix li' x s' til compt and
rekning for thre flescharis wpon the quhilk the said androw folowit him be a borch / quhar
for androw murray was adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wranguis' strekin of
the borch

Item Ranald talyour' before the ballies in Jugement grantit him souerty and borch til androw murray
forsaid for xix li' x s' for thre flescharis til gude commpt and rekning

Item eodem die decretum fuit per curiam quod gilbertus leche deuenit ad causam et clameum suum contra et
aduersus Cristianam fichet sponsam Dauid robertj de iniusta receptacione bonorum suorum tanquam
quarto et peremptorio die processus

the samyn dai ser Alexander club chaplan of the browne croce altar protestit that the deposicion of
thom club and his wif turn him to na preiudice anent his annuel of ix s' iiij d' acht til him
as chaplan of the said altar oute of a land analijt be thaim to alexander skynnar' / of the quhilk
annuel he producit and gert rede ane chartir before the ballies in Jugement sen thai depo
nit of les annuel than his chartir proportis

The viij dai of aprile yer' et cetera lxxxiij in the tolbuthe in presence of alexander rede moris' besat and vthiris thom
prat sayd that James of Kintor was warnit tilhaf comperit this day til his instance and comperit nocht
